segments.text: I'm a little rushed . Is there any quicker way to get there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , of course . You can take a taxi .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How much will that run me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It depends on traffic and distance , but it is reasonable .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Some are better than others . But , you shouldn't have a problem .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: For the most part , yes . If you don't feel comfortable with it , then it is best not to take one at night .
segments.speaker: S2
